metadata.businessValue: By mapping Business Needs and Meeting behaviorswe can determine which solution will match both the Meeting Space and theorganizational needs.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Short description
content: Definingyour Hybrid Work strategy, convert your Hybrid Workspaces and map the MicrosoftTeams solutions which fit the business processes.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Long description
content:
Hybrid Workspaces will bridge the gap between the physical and digital world and evolving with employee needs.
 
We deliver the Teams Meeting space for the new work scenarios!

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content: Every organization needs a plan and policies forthe path to extreme flexibility regarding the Work Spaces.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content: Communicativ will built a Hybrid work Matrixwhich will give insights in the Hybrid Work meeting spaces. We convert your businessneeds and deliver Teams certified devices to support these.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Success factors
content: By focusing on the business needs, the Hybrid Workspace solutions are rapidly adopted by the End Users.
